@usedefault

h2. Create a Machine Bucket

{{html:

<div class="form-horizontal">
<div class="control-group">
 <label class="control-label" >Name: </label> 

<div class="controls">
   <input data-bind='value: selectedBucket().name, valueUpdate: "afterkeydown"' type="text" class="input-xlarge" placeholder="Name"/>
   </div>
      </div>
 
 <div class="control-group">
 <label class="control-label" >Plan: </label> 
	<div class="controls shortcuts" >
		 {{include:plan_list}}
	</div>
</div>
 <div class="control-group">
 <label class="control-label" >Region </label> 
	<div class="controls shortcuts">
   {{include:region_list}}
	</div>
</div>
 <div class="control-group">
 <label class="control-label" > Image </label> 
	<div class="controls shortcuts">
   {{include:image_list}}
	</div>
</div>
<div class="control-group">
    <label class="control-label" for="id_enableVirtIO">Enable VirtIO</label>
    <div class="controls"><input type="checkbox" id="id_enableVirtIO" data-bind="checked: enableVirtIO"></div>    
</div>

 <div class="form-actions">
<button class="btn btn-info btn-large " data-bind="click: saveBucket, enable: selectedBucket().valid">Create</button>
</div>
</div>
}}
